title: Bans and Key fragments.
body: So basically i got a 14 day escalated ban, yet am still earning keys/boxes for games, is this supposed to be happening, because it's occured from since the ban (let alone i even got the ranked rewards.) does this mean the ban is being downgraded for next time or what?

replies.body: Idk maybe play the game instead of being a keyboard warrior on the boards
